verbose_text: In, brief, ATRA plus chemotherapy (ATRA 45 mg/m 2, idarubicin (IDA) 12 mg/m 2 for 2 days and cytarabine 100 mg/m 2 for 5 days) was administrated and successfully induced molecular complete remission (mCR) without CNS hemorrhage.
